Title: MCServe
Description: MCServe is the minecraft-server which takes advantage of the performance of the .NET Framework
HomeWiki:
Project Description
MCServe is the minecraft-server which takes advantage of the performance of the .NET Framework

Features
  • Available for operating-systems with .NET 4 or above (see system requirements at System requirements)
  • Available in multiple languages
  • Integrated update manager for server-software and plugins
  • Can be used with several Plug-Ins
  • Can be controlled from the console and through a GUI
  • Remote Controle :
    • Windows Phone App
    • Windows 8 App
    • Windows Desktop Applikation
    • Browser-App
  • Many more

Current Stable
At the moment, no stable release is available.

Have also a look on the Preview Page and on the Development History Page
